example.title: Examples
example.p: This section contains examples of how the desc element can be used.

fig.title: Description of a figure
fig.p: In the following code sample, the figure element contains a reference to an image of a famous painting by Leonardo da Vinci. The title element provides the name of the painting, while the desc element contains information about when the portrait is thought to have been painted.
fig.codeblock: <fig> <title>Mona Lisa</title> <desc>Circa 1503â€“06, perhaps continuing until 1517</desc> <image href="mona-lisa.jpg"> <alt>Photograph of Mona Lisa painting</alt> </image> </fig>

fig.title: Description of a cross reference
fig.p: In the following code sample, the link element contains a desc element. Some processors might render the content of the desc element as hover help.
fig.codeblock: <link keyref="dita-13-02"> <linktext>DITA 1.3 Errata 02</linktext> <desc>Final errata version of DITA 1.3, published 19 June 2018</desc> </link>
